Ladies and gentlemen, the response provided by the affirmative is an exceptionally engaging one. It not only acknowledges the previous fact about the NFL using tracking chips on the players but also expands on the potential benefits this technology could have on the safety of the game. This response highlights the importance of safety in sports, a topic that has been gaining significant attention in recent years. It is a topic that everyone can relate to, whether they are a sports enthusiast or not.

Furthermore, the response also shows a potential interest in the technology used in the NFL. This indicates that the speaker is knowledgeable about the sport and is willing to engage in a conversation about it. This level of engagement is essential in any conversation, as it shows that the speaker is interested in what the other person has to say and is willing to contribute to the conversation.

Therefore, the affirmative side believes that the provided response is highly engaging due to its ability to connect with the audience on a relatable topic, showcase the speaker's knowledge, and express a strong opinion on a critical issue.

Furthermore, the response does not provide any unique or insightful perspectives on the potential benefits of tracking chips in the NFL. It merely restates what is already known about the technology. Finally, the response does not leave any room for the other person to contribute to the conversation. It is a closed-ended response that does not encourage further discussion, which can be detrimental to the engagement level of the conversation.

Therefore, the negative side believes that the provided response is not highly engaging due to its lack of relevance to the given fact, lack of originality, and closed-ended nature.

topic_chat_history:
hi there , do you watch the nfl ? 
 i sure do . do you have a favorite team or player ? 
 i sure do . i love the patriot and tom is amazing . do you have one ? 
 the guys is awesome and now also a book author . did you hear about that ? 
 oh yeah i heard he wrote that book the tb12 method , the athelete 's bible but have not read it yet 
 he is everywhere . i want to read that book but i also want to watch the documentary too 
 same here . do you know he has a favorite ice cream flavor ? 
 oh sure it is avocado and i am not surprised he eats very healthy all the time 
 yup pretty much . did you know women are allowed to play in the nfl ? 
 that is pretty cool that there is no written rule against them and hope to see them in the field soon 
 yeah i hope so too . did you know engineers make more int heir lifetime ? 
 yeah and i wonder if that fact that they have longer careers has anything to do with that 
 that makes sense . the nfl is using tracking chips on the players now . 
 yes they are and they are collecting many stats such as velocity and rotation and others
topic_chat_fact: former partiots rb benjarvus green - ellis has never fumbled the football in his nfl career .
topic_chat_response: yeah i hope they can use that to make the game safer and also have to do that to make the game safer
